2106.name: HTTP_COULDNT_RESOLVE_HOST
2106.message:
Unable to connect to the Internet.

The network may be busy.
Please try again later.

If you are using a Wi-Fi network,
the signal strength may be poor.
Please make sure there are no
obstructions between the console
and network device, and then try
again.

If this problem persists, please check
whether or not you can connect to
the Internet from a PC or other
device using the same settings.
